title: Object tracking using CellProfiler
questions: How to segment and track objects in fluorescence time-lapse microscopy images?
objectives: Segment fluorescent objects using CellProfiler in Galaxy
Track objects over multiple frames using CellProfiler in Galaxy
key_points: CellProfiler in Galaxy can be used to track objects in time-lapse microscopy images

workflows.name: CP_object_tracking_example
workflows.title: CP_object_tracking_example
